explanation:
http://docs.oracle.com/javaee/6/api/javax/servlet/http/Cookie.html
HttpOnly代表只允許伺服器存取，無法被用戶端讀取
question: A cookie may be set to be an HttpOnly cookie. Setting a cookie to be HttpOnly results in (Choose two)

options.A: Client to not expose the cookie to client side scripting code
options.C: prevent certain types of cross-site scripting attacks
options.B: Does not work with https protocol
options.D: There is no such thing as an HttpOnly cookie
